game_description: Stay active with fun and effective exercise in VR. Bodyweight training exercises and games to get you moving your whole body, no need for extra equipment or expensive gym memberships. Custom workout options, environments and stats tracking help keep you motivated.
review_1: Great exercise app for multiple routines. Love the custom feature that lets you create your own workout. Would like to see more routines as well as the "reverse" workout. Arm swings only go in one direction...I manually do it but it would be nice for the program to mirror that. Nice job devs!
review_2: One of the best games you could get for a workout, this app focuses on getting you moving and giving you a balanced workout. It is a very active game. I recommend this game who want to lose weight and do a workout

review_4: A brilliant game that just doesn't focus on cardio! As a personal trainer in lockdown it's good to find a way of keeping up my strength while doing something I enjoy as a hobby. Definitely the best game to get on app lab now and there are many updates coming in the future! It definitely offers accountability and makes you want to go back day after day to improve yourself especially in the difficult times we find ourselves in.
review_5: This is the best app I've bought in VR and I am so much looking forward to more updates and improvements of the environment and some minor other stuff! Awesome work! Thank you for making me healthier!
